messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Uncle / new topic
messages.msgSnippet: It s interesting to me that you see it that way. No more- no less. And SMILE. Love, Jude ... ADVERTISEMENT [Image] ... [Non-text portions of this message
messages.messageBody:
"It's interesting to me that you see it that way."

No more- no less.
And SMILE.

Love, Jude

> I have one child who *loves* child sized furniture... chairs and such.
>

> *could* just use our regular chairs but the little chairs are fun for
> him for
> some reason. >>
>
> Uncle! Uncle!!**
>
> Looks like we are ready for a new topic. My uncle is having a
> surprise
> party for his 80th birthday this fall, and I'm going to be spending
> time
> with a lot of far-flung family members, some of whom are public school
> teachers.
>
> I need some armor and some ammo for when the critical questions start
> popping.
>
> Betsy

messages.subject: Uncle / new topic
messages.messageBody:
**<< I have bought step stools for the kitchen so the kids could reach
the sink
easily. I could just have used a couple of phone books, I guess, but I
went
ahead and bought a step stool. Because they're more attractive, I guess.
I have one child who *loves* child sized furniture... chairs and such.
He
*could* just use our regular chairs but the little chairs are fun for
him for
some reason. >>

Uncle! Uncle!!**

Looks like we are ready for a new topic. My uncle is having a surprise
party for his 80th birthday this fall, and I'm going to be spending time
with a lot of far-flung family members, some of whom are public school teachers.

I need some armor and some ammo for when the critical questions start popping.

Betsy
